title: First Gothic Cathedral Construction
visuals: flying buttresses; pointed arches; ribbed vaults; stained glass windows; tall spires
prompt: A detailed illustration of the first Gothic cathedral under construction in the 12th century, showcasing flying buttresses, pointed arches, ribbed vaults, and stained glass windows, with medieval workers and scaffolding.

title: Discovery of Penicillin
visuals: laboratory setting; Petri dishes with mold; scientist examining samples; microscope; medical breakthrough illustration
prompt: A detailed illustration of Alexander Fleming in a 1920s laboratory, surrounded by Petri dishes with mold, examining samples under a microscope, representing the discovery of penicillin.

title: First Crossing of the English Channel
visuals: hot air balloon; English Channel; 18th-century attire; coastal landscape; ballooning equipment
prompt: A historical depiction of the first successful crossing of the English Channel by hot air balloon in 1785, featuring Jean-Pierre Blanchard and John Jeffries in 18th-century attire, with a view of the English Channel and coastal landscape, showcasing the ballooning equipment of the era.

title: Construction of Machu Picchu
visuals: stone terraces; Incan architecture; mountainous landscape; ancient ruins; cloud forest
prompt: A detailed depiction of the construction of Machu Picchu, showcasing Incan architecture with stone terraces and ancient ruins set against a mountainous landscape and cloud forest.

title: The Black Death in Europe
visuals: medieval city streets; plague doctors in masks; mass graves; abandoned villages; illustrations of the bubonic plague
prompt: A medieval European city during the Black Death, with plague doctors in masks, empty streets, and a somber atmosphere, illustrating the impact of the bubonic plague.
